specialRules.name_en: Eternal Hatred, Goad Beast, Hatred (High Elves)*, Murderous, Strike First* (*Note that these special rules do not apply to this model's mount.)
specialRules.name_de: Eternal Hatred, Goad Beast, Hatred (High Elves)*, Murderous, Strike First* (*Note that these special rules do not apply to this model's mount.)
specialRules.name_es: Odio acérrimo, Domador de bestias, Odio (Altos elfos)*, Destreza homicida, Siempre ataca primero* (*Estas reglas especiales no se aplican a la montura de la miniatura)
specialRules.name_fr: Haine éternelle, Aiguillon à bêtes, Haine (Hauts-Elfes), Meurtier, Frappe en premier

notes.name_en: Goad Beast: During the Command sub-phase of their turn, this character may goad a single friendly model whose troop type is ‘monster' and that is within their Command range (including their own mount). Until the end of this turn, that model gains a +D3 modifier to its Attacks characteristic (to a maximum of 10).
notes.name_de: Goad Beast: During the Command sub-phase of their turn, this character may goad a single friendly model whose troop type is ‘monster' and that is within their Command range (including their own mount). Until the end of this turn, that model gains a +D3 modifier to its Attacks characteristic (to a maximum of 10).
notes.name_es: Domador de bestias: Durante la subfase de Mando de su turno, este personaje puede acosar a una sola miniatura amiga cuyo tipo sea 'monstruo' y que esté en su rango de Mando (incluida su propia montura). Hasta el final de este turno, esa miniatura gana un modificador de +D3 a su característica de ataques (hasta un máximo de 10).

notes.name_es: Danza de la muerte: Si esta unidad realiza un movimiento exitoso de carga, el objetifo obtiene un modificador de -1 al Máxima bonificación por Filas hasta el final de la fase de combate de ese turno. Una miniatura equipada con látigo y broquel ve mejorado su valor de armadura en 1
